column4: Unibet Zero% Mission EBF Novice Stakes (GBB Race)
column19: Mr Writer has the benefit of experience but both newcomers appeal on paper and RAPID FORCE is taken to make a winning debut.
column20: Evs Rapid Force, 15/8 Mr Writer, 100/30 Zooella
column36: Too free latest but has shown enough to win a race of this nature, including over C&D
column37: Ran with promise in some useful maiden/novice events, including C&D, and he was sent off favourite for a Class 3 nursery at Doncaster (7f, good to soft) four weeks ago; pulled too hard there and dropped away to be beaten over 6l but he should benefit from the return to sprinting and he sets a fair standard for the newcomers to aim at.

column4: Try Unibet's New Improved Acca Boosts Nursery Handicap
